content: inspired by the beautiful gradient of this yarn this shawl is designed to resemble the petals of a flower or peacock feathers cascading down your back it is shaped like a crescent to better stay on your shoulders as you wear it when made with fingering weight yarn and a 4mm g hook the shawl measures 52 inches long from tip to tip and 25 inches wide __________ update 8/27 typos fixed and a mistake corrected ____________________
